Registry of Open Data on AWS

NEXRAD on AWS

agriculture earth observation meteorological natural resource sustainability weather

Description

Real-time and archival data from the Next Generation Weather Radar (NEXRAD) network.

Update Frequency

New Level II data is added as soon as it is available.

License

There are no restrictions on the use of this data.

Documentation

https://docs.opendata.aws/noaa-nexrad/readme.html

Managed By

See all datasets managed by Unidata.

Contact

support-level2@unidata.ucar.edu

Usage Examples

  • NEXRAD on EC2 tutorial by openradar
  • Using Python to Access NCEI Archived NEXRAD Level 2 Data (Jupyter notebook) by Ryan May
Tools & Applications
  • Into the eye of the storm: NEXRAD Level II open data by Jonni Walker
  • nexradaws on pypi.python.org - python module to query and download Nexrad data from Amazon S3 by Aaron Anderson
  • Open NEXRAD Data Access for Level 3 with Lambda@Edge by Zac Flamig
  • WeatherPipe - Amazon EMR based analysis tool for NEXRAD data stored on Amazon S3 by Stephen Lien Harrell
Publications
  • Declines in an abundant aquatic insect, the burrowing mayfly, across major North American waterways by Phillip M. Stepanian, Sally A. Entrekin, Charlotte E. Wainwright, Djordje Mirkovic, Jennifer L. Tank, & Jeffrey F. Kelly
  • Extreme Pyroconvective Updrafts During a Megafire by B. Rodriguez, N. P. Lareau, D. E. Kingsmill, & C. B. Clements
  • Level 2 Interface Control Document for Message Data Formats: Build 18 by NOAA ROC
  • Level 2 Interface Control Document for Transfer: Build 18 by NOAA ROC
  • Level 3 Interface Control Document for Message Data Formats: Build 18 by NOAA ROC
  • Seasonal abundance and survival of North America’s migratory avifauna determined by weather radar by Adriaan M. Dokter, Andrew Farnsworth, Daniel Fink, Viviana Ruiz-Gutierrez, Wesley M. Hochachka, Frank A. La Sorte, Orin J. Robinson, Kenneth V. Rosenberg & Steve Kelling
  • Unlocking the Potential of NEXRAD Data through NOAA’s Big Data Partnership by Steve Ansari and Stephen Del Greco

Resources on AWS

  • Description
    NEXRAD Level II archive data
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::noaa-nexrad-level2
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://noaa-nexrad-level2/ --no-sign-request
    Explore
    Browse Bucket
  • Description
    NEXRAD Level II real-time data
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::unidata-nexrad-level2-chunks
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://unidata-nexrad-level2-chunks/ --no-sign-request
  • Description
    NEXRAD Level III real-time select data
    Resource type
    S3 Bucket
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:s3:::unidata-nexrad-level3
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
    AWS CLI Access (No AWS account required)
    aws s3 ls s3://unidata-nexrad-level3/ --no-sign-request
    Explore
    Browse Bucket
  • Description
    Rich notifications for real-time data with filterable fields
    Resource type
    SNS Topic
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:sns:us-east-1:684042711724:NewNEXRADLevel2ObjectFilterable
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
  • Description
    Notifications for the Level II archival bucket
    Resource type
    SNS Topic
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:sns:us-east-1:811054952067:NewNEXRADLevel2Archive
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
  • Description
    Notifications for the Level III bucket
    Resource type
    SNS Topic
    Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
    arn:aws:sns:us-east-1:684042711724:NewNEXRADLevel3Object
    AWS Region
    us-east-1
